description: This file declares the exported API functions for the Bmc2 Req Controller component within the Broadway Management Console v2.0 implementation, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: Bmc2CreateReqController
methods.description: Creates a new request controller instance within a given container context.

methods.name: Bmc2ReqcoCreate
methods.description: Creates a request controller object with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: Bmc2ReqcoRemove
methods.description: Removes a specified request controller instance.

methods.name: Bmc2ReqcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects within the request controller instance.
